messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who enters into an agreement with the Miskatonic University to assay and collate the Hobbhouse papers and library?
The Cobb family
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who successfully lobbies for control of the project at the History Faculty?
Professor Charles Leiter
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why does Leiter spread the word about the sale of the Arkham Witch Trial Papers?
Leiter is in need of money after a disastrous gambling trip to Atlantic City.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who offers vast sums for the Arkham Witch Trial Papers?
Unknown, vast sums are offered by some
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does Leiter do with the Arkham Witch Trial Papers on September 5th?
Leiter passes the Arkham Witch Trial Papers to Cecil Hunter to create forgeries
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to Leiter's cottage on September 11th?
Leiter's cottage is broken into and ransacked by Flinders
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why does Leiter update his cottage's security on September 12th?
Leiter updates his cottage's security by changing the locks and adding bolts to doors and windows
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to Cecil Hunter on September 16th?
Cecil Hunter goes mad while trying to copy the Papers
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who writes out the death certificate for Leiter?
Doctor John Wheatcroft, a physician at the Miskatonic's Medical School
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who seeks outside help due to increasing terse enquiries?
Dean Fallon
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the name of the institution where Doctor John Wheatcroft is a physician?
Miskatonic's Medical School
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the name of the school that Dean Fallon is affiliated with?
Miskatonic's Medical School
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is happening to the body of Leiter?
He has died of 'massive and sudden heart failure'
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is investigating the strange occurrences?
The investigators (no specific names mentioned)
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is happening to those who have had close contact with the papers?
The Horror is hunting them down
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is increasing rapidly as the Horror hunts down those who have had close contact?
The manifestations
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of the roleplaying hooks in the NPCs?
The hooks provide you with possible ways to engage the NPC with the investigators and to complicate the investigator’s lives.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is the intended audience for the scenario provided?
The information presented is intended first and foremost as a skeleton for the Keeper to flesh out as desired...
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What resource may Keepers use to determine locations of non-player characters outside of Miskatonic University?
The Map of Arkham (see page 428) may be useful in determining locations of the various non-player characters who live outside of Miskatonic University.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What publication by Chaosium may be used in conjunction with the scenario?
H.P. Lovecraft’s Arkham would be useful in conjunction with the scenario.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What publication by Chaosium may be used in conjunction with the scenario?
Miskatonic University would be useful in conjunction with the scenario.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the ultimate goal of the Keeper in using the scenario?
To make the best use of the scenario for their own game and to suit their own tastes and that of the players.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the nature of the additional detail the Keeper can add to the scenario?
More detail as he or she wishes—all to make the best use of the scenario for their own game and to suit their own tastes and that of the players.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the main goal of the expansion sources?
To provide additional information to aid the Keeper in creating the best use of the scenario for their own game and to suit their own tastes and that of the players.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the ultimate goal of the Keeper in using the expansion sources?
To make the best use of the scenario for their own game and to suit their own tastes and that of the players.
